entities.name: pugClient

parameters.name: pugs
parameters.description: an array of pug objects with the properties above

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: the name that will be used to indentify this template

parameters.name: directory
parameters.description: the directory that will be set to the cwd when pug.compileClient is called

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: whether or not the function will be built as an exportable ES module

entities.description: takes an array of pug objects and returns a function that can use all of them on the client

returns.description: a string of characters that, when evaluated, produces a function, named pug by default

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: value of the pug object passed into pugClient

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: return a string of HTML instead of a DocumentFragment

returns.description: a DocumentFragment containing the rendered Pug template or a string of the rendered Pug template
